AlphaBanner.bannerText: This is a new service - your <url>feedback</url> will help us to improve it.

main.title: Building Blocks
main.subtitle: Build and run online services easily
main.description: Building Blocks are reusable, compatible software parts. They include messaging, digital forms, online payments, case management, and a design system that unites them all with a familiar look and feel.
main.secondaryP1: Your users can complete a form, send you information, make secure payments and receive notifications with Building Blocks. It's low-cost, easy to set up and has accessibility built in from the start.
main.secondaryP2: Government departments can use any number of these Building Blocks to create solutions that meet people's needs.

payments.title: Payments
payments.description: Our payments block is built on a robust infrastructure that enables secure and efficient financial transactions, giving users peace of mind every time they use it.

messaging.title: Messaging
messaging.description: The Messaging Building Block is a communication solution tailored to streamline interactions with the public.

designSystem.title: Design System
designSystem.description: Streamline your design process and ensure consistency across your digital services with the gov.ie Design System.
designSystem.cta: Learn more about the Design System

forms.title: FormsIE
forms.description: Enhance your unit's operations with FormsIE, a digital solution for online forms that is user-friendly, efficient and accessible.

advantages.title: Why use Building Blocks
advantages.description: Building Blocks are created by the Digital Services Unit (DSU).

noProcurement.title: No procurement
noProcurement.description: As a government-owned product, there is no need for a lengthy wait procuring external suppliers.

noCode.title: No code
noCode.description: All our tools can be implemented with no technical knowledge.

lowCost.title: Low cost
lowCost.description: Our tools are competitively priced when compared with other software on the market.

accessible.title: Accessible
accessible.description: All our tools are fully accessible for both civil servants and end users and comply with the EU Web Accessibility Directive.

trustedExperience.title: Trusted experience
trustedExperience.description: Put your users at ease with a government-branded look and feel and a familiar gov.ie design system.

test.title: Test before you launch
test.description: Quickly test early versions of your service before you build it, saving time and money and reducing risk.

footer.title: The Building Blocks
footer.listItem2: send and receive notifications and information
footer.descriptionP1: It's low cost, easy to set up and has accessibility baked in from the start.
footer.descriptionP2: You can use one, some or all of the Building Blocks to support the service that you offer.
